name: Ferienwohnungen Geisler
description: Our house is situated in a central, yet sunny and quiet position. Car park, 2 minute walk to town cengtre and the Penken lifts. Both apartments are comfortably furnished, have a fully equipped kitchen, shower/WC, 1 separate WC, balcony, cable TV, ski room with electric ski boot dryer.
Bread delivery service available on request!

Check in: 14.00hr, check out: 10.00hr.
Directions: Use the B169 to Mayrhofen, straight ahead at the roundabout, past the railway station and the Aral petrol station. After the bridge turn left at the Red Cross building and our house can be found on the right after approx. 100 metres.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 2 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: Our apartment (approx. 58m²) is furnished with a modern, fully equipped kitchen, entrance hall with cloakroom, comfortable lounge with sleeping room for 2 persons, cable TV, a double room with shower/WC, a separate WC and balcony. All living and sleeping areas have parquet flooring.

makesOffer.name: Apartment, shower, toilet, 3 bed rooms
makesOffer.description: The apartment (74m²) is furnished with a modern, fully equipped kitchen with cable TV, lounge with cable TV and sleeping room for 2 persons, a double bedroom, a bedroom for 3 persons, shower/WC, a separate WC and balcony. All living and sleeping areas have parquet flooring.
